result.name: Provincial and Ministry jointly build a cultivation base of the State Key Laboratory of Organic Dry Farming Agriculture (in preparation)
result.description: A total of 282 wheat samples were characterized using genotyping-by-sequencing (GBS). For all characterizations, DNA was extracted from 10-cm-long leaves of 10-days-old seedlings. After eliminating markers with an allele frequency (MAF) <0.05, >10% missing data, or >20% heterozygosity were retained and VCF files generated.
result.center: State Key Laboratory of Sustainable Dryland Agriculture, Institute of Wheat Research, Shanxi Agricultural University, Linfen, China
